verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Adonai, here I am
You are strong in my weakness
And in the desert You revive me
You give rest to my soul

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Pour out Your Spirit
Pour out Your Spirit
So that I might become like You, Adonai

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh Lord, take hold of me
Not my will but Yours
I will wait upon You on my knees
Surely I will see Your Glory

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
That I might see as You see
That I might love as You love, Adonai
